summary: Adds more light sources and vegetation and removes the snow hills to make this city much lovelier
descriptionHtml:
I always found Windhelm the most ugly city in Skyrim, so i decided to make it much lovelier by adding vegetation, more light sources and removing the ugly parts like snow hills.   


Information:
-Removed half of the graves and added some trees instead
-Added much green vegetation and fences to the left graves to make a nice graveyard
-Added fences at stairs to make the city more structured
-Added torches to light up some dark corners in Windhelm
-Added vegetation in the area around Hjerim 
-Added much banners with Stormcloak symbols on it, if you don\'t like it there is 
 an alternate file without banners
-Huge fire in the middle of the market
 

Known Bugs:
-The old woman is still walking her path but there are no graves anymore(should not be a problem)
-If you find more buggs tell me please


If you have ideas for me to change or add tell me please.
Thank you for downloading my mod. 
Please endorse if you like it.
author: nutron333
